tool_description: Calculates inventory values using different costing methods and provides financial reporting data for inventory assets.

valuation_method.description: Costing method: FIFO, LIFO, weighted_average, or standard_cost

location_scope.description: Location IDs to include in valuation calculation

valuation_date.description: Date for which to calculate inventory valuation

include_obsolete.description: Whether to include obsolete inventory in valuation

error_messages: Invalid valuation method: Use FIFO, LIFO, weighted_average, or standard_cost.
Future valuation date: Cannot calculate valuation for future dates.
Invalid currency code: Must be a valid 3-letter ISO currency code.
Insufficient cost data: Missing cost information for inventory valuation calculation.
usage: Specify valuation_method, location_scope, and valuation_date. Choose whether to include_obsolete inventory and set currency_code for reporting.

total_inventory_value.description: Total monetary value of inventory using specified method

valuation_by_location.description: Inventory values broken down by location

valuation_by_category.description: Inventory values broken down by product category
